results.title: Simvastatin inhibits the apoptosis of hippocampal cells in a mouse model of Alzheimer's disease
results.text_hl: Furthermore, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ improved the @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ status of 3xTg-@DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, as determined by a learning task in which @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ exhibited significantly reduced @DISEASE_Attention_Deficit_Disorder_with_Hyperactivity @DISEASE_MESH:D001289 @@@attention impairment@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Disruptive_Impulse_Control_and_Conduct_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007174 @@@impulsivity@@@ and compulsivity (P<0.01).

citations.NLM: Hu X, Song C, Fang M, Li C. Simvastatin inhibits the apoptosis of hippocampal cells in a mouse model of Alzheimer's disease Exp Ther Med. 2018 Feb;15(2):1795-1802. PMID: 29434767
